data.name: Rune Factory 5 - Rune Factory 2 Outfits: Kyle and Mana
data.detailed_description:
Dress up your character as Kyle or Mana from Rune Factory 2.

"Mana's Outfit" can only be worn by the female protagonist.

"Kyle's Outfit" can only be worn by the male protagonist.

Additional outfits can be selected from the wardrobe in your character's bedroom.
data.about_the_game:
Dress up your character as Kyle or Mana from Rune Factory 2.

"Mana's Outfit" can only be worn by the female protagonist.

"Kyle's Outfit" can only be worn by the male protagonist.

Additional outfits can be selected from the wardrobe in your character's bedroom.
data.short_description: This content requires the base game Rune Factory 5 on Steam in order to play.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Japanese*, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.1 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
